maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: This is \c[3]Zir'vitar Temple\c[0]. One of the temples in Gaia's Garden.
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: C'est le \c[3]\v[area.shock-dng.name]\c[0]. Un des temples dans le \v[area.jungle.name].

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: Are you sure you want to enter the dungeon already, Lea?
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Est-ce que tu es sûre de déjà vouloir entrer dans le donjon, Lea ?

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: Shouldn't you meet up with \c[3]C'tron\c[0] first?
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Est-ce que tu devrais pas rencontrer \c[3]C'tron\c[0] avant ?

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: Come on, Lea. No more dungeon running today.
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Aller, Lea. Plus de course au donjon pour aujourd'hui.

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: There is still another day tomorrow, right?
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: On a toujours le temps de faire ça demain, non ?

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: Here we go...\. Let the race continue!!
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Et...\. la course continue !!

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: Uhm...\. we already started the race of the \c[3]So'najiz Temple\c[0].
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Euh...\. On a déjà commencé la course sur le \c[3]\v[area.wave-dng.name]\c[0].

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: I mean we can just put that race on the hold and run the \c[3]Zir'vitar Temple\c[0] instead.
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Je veux dire, on pourrait mettre cette course en pause et courir le \c[3]\v[area.shock-dng.name]\c[0] à la place.

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: It's your call!
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: C'est ton choix !

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: You want to start the race of the Zir'vitar Temple?
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Tu veux démarrer la course au \v[area.shock-dng.name] ?

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: Hm... Looking at your stats and level, do you really think that you're prepared, Lea?
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Euh... en regardant tes stats et ton niveau, tu penses vraiment que tu es prête, Lea ?

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: True... I heard your average stats should be somewhat above \c[3]180\c[0].
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: C'est vrai... J'ai cru comprendre que la moyenne de tes stats devrait être au-dessus de \c[3]180\c[0].

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: We can look for better equipment at Basin Keep first, if you want.
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: On peut retourner au \v[area.jungle-city.name] pour chercher du meilleur équipement, si tu veux.

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: Anyway it's your call!
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: En tout cas, c'est comme tu veux !

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: I think we're all well prepared, non?
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Je pense qu'on est tous bien préparés, non ?

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: Ready to start the race of the Zir'vitar Temple?
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Prêt à démarrer la course au \v[area.shock-dng.name] ?

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: Okey-dokey!
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Dacodac !

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: Everybody get ready!
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: À vos marques tout le monde !

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: [shakes head]
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: D'accord, just don't let us wait for too long~
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: D'accord, mais ne nous fais pas attendre trop longtemps~

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: [yes]
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: [oui]

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: [no]
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: [non]

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: Hey Lea, we should call C'tron before entering the Temple.
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Hé, Lea, on devrait appeler C'tron avant d'entrer dans le temple.

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: Don't forget about our race, non?
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Tu n'as pas oublié pour notre course, non ?

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: Lea, what about Emilie? We wanted to race the dungeon together, right?
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Lea, et pour Emilie ? On voulait faire la course au donjon ensemble, non ?

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: Lea, what about that dungeon race? You were planning to enter the dungeon together with Emilie and C'tron, right?
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Lea, tu as pensé à la course ? Tu voulais entrer dans le donjon avec Emilie et C'tron, correct ?

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: Here we are... the Zir'vitar dungeon.
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Nous y voilà... le donjon de Zir'vitar.

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: Such a gloomy atmosphere...
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Quelle atmosphère lugubre...

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: Well... we're at the border of the \c[3]infested jungle\c[0].
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Oui, bon... on est à la frontière de la \c[3]jungle infestée\c[0].

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: Oh right, and the infestation comes from the power plant here?
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Ah oui, c'est vrai. Et l'infestation vient de cette centrale ici ?

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: That's what the Shad believe anyway.
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: C'est ce que les Shads pensent en tout cas.

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: Well, well. You certainly match the description.
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Regardez qui voilà. Vous correspondez bien à la description.
... Salut ?

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: Are you not the Seeker who solved the problem with the Shad?
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: N'êtes-vous pas le \v[lore.title.seeker] qui a résolu le problème avec les Shads ?

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: Ah, so my calculations were indeed correct. As always.
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Ah, donc mes calculs étaient corrects. Comme toujours.

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: Anyway, your help has been very much appreciated. My name is \c[3]Dr. Lou Cretia\c[0].
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: En tout cas, votre aide a vraiment été précieuse. Mon nom est \c[3]Dr. Lou Cretia\c[0].

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: ...Lea!
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: ... Lea !

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: Dr. Cretia
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Dr. Cretia

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: Of course, the Shad are a tad off in their thesis that the power plant is the root cause for this strange "infestation".
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Bien entendu, l'hypothèse des Shads est un peu fausse, en pensant que la centrale est la source de cette "infestation" étrange.

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: I would know, it's my obligation to make sure of it.
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Je devrais le savoir, après tout, c'est mon travail de m'en assurer.

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: There is no leakage, no parameters off the expected spectrum.
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Il n'y a pas de fuite. Tous les paramètres sont dans le spectre attendu.

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: From the track's perspective, the plant might as well not be here!
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Du point de vue du tracé, la centrale électrique pourrait même ne pas exister !

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: Obviously, something else must be causing this.
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: C'est évident que la raison de tout cela se trouve autre part.

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: I'm not sure what, exactly, but I will continue to investigate.
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Je ne suis pas sûre de ce que c'est exactement, mais je vais continuer mes recherches.

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: Well...I'm sure you're here to enter the temple, so I won't distract you any further.
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Mais bon... Je suis sûre que vous êtes là pour entrer dans le temple, donc je ne vais pas vous distraire plus longtemps.

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: Good luck and if there is anything you'd like to know, feel free to drop by in my office.
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Bonne chance. Et s'il y a quelque chose que vous désirez savoir, vous pouvez toujours me voir à mon bureau.

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: It's in that building to the left!
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: C'est dans ce bâtiment à gauche !

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: Dr. Cretia
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Dr. Cretia

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: Until then, Seeker.
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: À plus, \v[lore.title.seeker].

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: Bye!
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Bye !

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: Dr. Cretia
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Dr. Cretia

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: Good. First step, let's get rid of the \c[3]cats and their source\c[0]!
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Bien. Première étape : Se débarrasser des \c[3]chats et de leur source\c[0] !

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: You know how to deal with them, right?
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Vous savez comment vous y prendre, non ?

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: Guards, the barrier please.
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Gardes, la barrière, s'il vous plait.

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: Dr. Cretia
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Dr. Cretia

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: Good luck.
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Bonne chance.

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: Dr. Cretia
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Dr. Cretia

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: Let's first get rid of these \c[3]cats and their source\c[0]!
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Débarrassons-nous d'abord de ces \c[3]chats et de leur source\c[0] !

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: Dr. Cretia
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Dr. Cretia

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: Perfect. I took some measurements and things are behaving exactly as I expected.
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Parfait. J'ai fait quelques mesures et les choses se comportent exactement comme je le pensais.

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: You see, you might think the \c[3]\v[combat.name.minibosses/shockcat-black]s\c[0] and their source are already defeated.
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Vous savez, vous pourriez croire que les \c[3]\v[combat.name.minibosses/shockcat-black]s\c[0] et leur source ont été vaincus.

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: But, in fact, we only scratched the surface of the problem!
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Mais, en fait, on a fait qu'effleurer la surface du problème !

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: Next step, take this device.
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Ce qui nous amène à la deuxième étape : prenez cet appareil.

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: \v[item.429.name]
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: \v[item.429.name]

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: Dr. Cretia
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Dr. Cretia

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: ...How?
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: ... Comment ?

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: I call this the \c[3]Frequency And Impulse Rattler\c[0] or the \c[3]FAIR\c[0].
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: J'appelle ça le \c[3]Chasseur Fréquence et Impulsion\c[0], ou \c[3]Chasseur FI\c[0].

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: This device is able to disrupt a rather large field around you.
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Cet appareil est capable de perturber les signaux d'une large zone autour de vous.

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: Anything that uses the same frequency should get picked up by this device.
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Tout ce qui utilise la même fréquence devrait être visible par cet appareil.

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: And if my calculations are correct, you should be able to see the real source of the problem!
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Et si mes calculs sont corrects, vous devriez être capable de voir la véritable source du problème !

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: So please, go ahead!
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Donc, cherchons-la !

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: Dr. Cretia
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Dr. Cretia

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: See? I knew it! We just uncovered another hidden part of the track's working!
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Vous voyez ? Je le savais ! Nous venons tout juste de découvrir une autre partie du puzzle du mécanisme du Tracé !

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: These poles must be the \c[3]true source\c[0], controlling and spawning the cats over time!
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Ces pôles doivent être les \c[3]véritables sources\c[0], qui de temps en temps, font apparaitre les chats et les contrôlent !

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: Now that we can see them, we should be able to remove them!
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Maintenant que nous pouvons les voir, nous devrions pouvoir nous en débarrasser !

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: Go ahead, Seeker! But be careful, these poles are the real thing. They might behave differently!
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: En avant, \v[lore.title.seeker] ! Mais soyez prudente, ces pôles sont les véritables coupables. Ils sont peut-être encore plus dangereux !

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: Dr. Cretia
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Dr. Cretia

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: Go ahead, Seeker! But be careful, these poles are the real thing. They might behave differently!
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: En avant, \v[lore.title.seeker] ! Mais soyez prudente, ces pôles sont les véritables coupables. Ils sont peut-être encore plus dangereux !

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: Dr. Cretia
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Dr. Cretia

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: This was quite educational.
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: C'était assez instructif.

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: Who would have thought the track could hide these poles in plain sight.
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Qui pourrait penser que le tracé pouvait cacher ces pôles juste devant nos yeux.

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: And it seems they form a kind of chain stretching out over a larger area.
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Et on dirait qu'ils forment une sorte de chaine qui s'étend sur un large territoire.

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: This mechanism feels somewhat familiar, though I can't put my finger on what it does exactly.
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Ce mécanisme me semble assez familier, mais je ne me souviens plus à quoi ça sert.

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: I need more data, Seeker!
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: J'ai besoin de plus de données, \v[lore.title.seeker] !

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: Dr. Cretia
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Dr. Cretia

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: That surprised even me!
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Même moi ça m'a surpris !

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: This pole here pointed downwards, right?
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Ce pôle-là pointait vers cette direction, non ?

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: So this means there are more of these, maybe they lead to a kind of root from which all these poles originated.
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Donc ça veut dire qu'il y en a encore plus, peut-être qu'ils mènent vers une sorte de racine, depuis lequel tous ces pôles viennent ?

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: In which case you must find it!
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Dans ce cas, vous devez la trouver !

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: Please come back and report your findings once you do, okay?
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Revenez me voir quand vous aurez trouvé quelque chose, OK ?

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: Great! I'll be in my office again, pondering on what we found so far.
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Super ! Je vais retourner dans mon bureau, pour réfléchir à ce que l'on vient de découvrir.

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: Dr. Cretia told us to close off this area for now.
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Dr. Cretia nous a demandé de fermer cet endroit pour le moment.

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: Good luck, Seeker.
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Bonne chance, \v[lore.title.seeker].

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: Dr. Cretia told us to close off this area for now.
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Dr. Cretia nous a demandé de fermer cet endroit pour le moment.

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: Good luck, Seeker.
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Bonne chance, \v[lore.title.seeker].

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: This way, Seeker!
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Par ici, \v[lore.title.seeker] !

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: Dr. Cretia
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Dr. Cretia

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: There they are.
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Les voilà.

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: Dr. Cretia
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Dr. Cretia

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: Please ignore them for now. We'll deal with those in a bit!
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Ignorez-les pour l'instant. On va s'en occuper plus tard !

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: To my office!
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Allez dans mon bureau !

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: And up goes the barrier.
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Et on remonte la barrière.

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: We need to make sure they don't escape.
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Il faut qu'on s'assure qu'ils ne s'échappent pas.

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: So much data... Come back to me, Seeker.
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Tant de données... Revenez me voir, \v[lore.title.seeker].

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: Looks like it's not over yet.
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: On dirait que ce n'est pas encore fini.

maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.orig: Come back here, Seeker!
maps/jungle/dng/shock-exterior.json/enti.text: Revenez ici, \v[lore.title.seeker] !
